trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Antioch
There was one other sighting in Antioch on or around October 22nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was, at the time of the sighting, laying down in my backyard to get some sun, i had my head turned to the right when i saw what appeared to be an airplane or some kind of aircraft that had a contrail behind it, when i sat up to look closer it looked like a line moving through the sky very quickly without any apparent sound. i watched the object move through the sky headed east, it appeared to have an aura around it, at the time the object looked simply like a flying line, the object never changed its angle which was about at 40 degrees, it moved smoothly, the object flew like an airplane only smoother and much much faster i only had sight of the object for about 20 seconds, after a few seconds of staring at it, i pulled out my camera phone (knowing that my phone can take large pictures) so that i could zoom into the spot for myself. a few seconds after i took the picture the object moved east and then moved south, i lost sight of the object as the object flew behind the row of large pine trees, out of my line of sight. i didn't think much about it until i got home and enlarged the picture to the spot, the line appears to have three or four craft within it. i have posted the picture along with this report. the photo is completely unedited and i ask everyone who reads this to examine the photo. to get a better view save the picture to your pictures within your documents then go to the picture. click actual size, and then zoom into line which is between the large antenna and some telephone\electric line. i honestly do not know what is in the photo but i can assure you that it is genuine and is not an atmospheric anomaly of any kind. please email me at ghandivitamine@gmail.com if you have any comments or questions (in particular the picture) and thank you for reading.
Summary: 3 disc shaped objects flying in formation at appx 40 degree angle
